data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The HTML::DragAndDrop module provides a Perl interface to Walter
    Zorn's Javascript Drag and Drop library. See
    http://www.walterzorn.com/dragdrop/dragdrop_e.htm.

    Walter's Javascript library provides:

    A Cross-browser JavaScript DHTML Library which adds Drag Drop
    functionality to layers and to any desired image, even those
    integrated into the text flow.

    The namespace was chosen after reading through the suggestions at
    module-authors.
